content: Several books written by CIA Operatives, Army Delta Force Operators...etc Have given us this information: Bin Laden was in Tora Bora, George W Bush's Department of Defense, chaired by Donald Rumsfeld, refused to give our ground assets an element from the 1st Ranger Battalion to back them up and deal with the high volume of terrorists protecting Bin Laden. So he got away, Rumsfelds stupid ego was kept intact, and America remained in imminent danger...

content: quote: Kill Bin Laden: A Delta Force Commander's Account of the Hunt for the World's Most Wanted Man Why don't you check the book out? Never mind, i'm assuming you read. Either way, I know as a matter of fact that the 1st Ranger Battalion was denied authority to assist Delta and the CIA in Tora Bora....those orders came from Rumsfeld, and presumably George W Bush/Dick Cheney... They denied the Rangers, and denied a Marine combat force too....The mission failed and failed miserably because our forces were denied the tools necessary to win. Osama Bin Laden was in Tora Bora, The White House/Department of Defense knew this....and he got away because of them.. Hmmmm...Don't take my word for it, read the damn book.
quote: Kill Bin Laden: A Delta Force Commander's Account of the Hunt for the World's Most Wanted Man
reply: Why don't you check the book out? Never mind, i'm assuming you read.
